sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:ccoh="http://ccohs.ca/"> <soap:Header> <ccoh:AuthHeader> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:UserName>${AuthHeader.UserName}</ccoh:UserName> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:Password>${AuthHeader.Password}</ccoh:Password> </ccoh:AuthHeader> </soap:Header> <soap:Body> <ccoh:AddRenewalNoticeToOpportunity> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:opportunity> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:ID>${opportunity.ID}</ccoh:ID> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:ClassID>${opportunity.ClassID}</ccoh:ClassID> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:BusinessAcctID>${opportunity.BusinessAcctID}</ccoh:BusinessAcctID> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:LocationID>${opportunity.LocationID}</ccoh:LocationID> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:Subject>${opportunity.Subject}</ccoh:Subject> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:Status>${opportunity.Status}</ccoh:Status> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:Reason>${opportunity.Reason}</ccoh:Reason> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:EcommRenewalNoticeID>${opportunity.EcommRenewalNoticeID}</ccoh:EcommRenewalNoticeID> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:EcommEmailRenewalNotice>${opportunity.EcommEmailRenewalNotice}</ccoh:EcommEmailRenewalNotice> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:EmailSentTo>${opportunity.EmailSentTo}</ccoh:EmailSentTo> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:Activities> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ccoh:ActivityInfo> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:Summary>${ActivityInfo.Summary}</ccoh:Summary> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:ActivityType>${ActivityInfo.ActivityType}</ccoh:ActivityType> </ccoh:ActivityInfo> </ccoh:Activities> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:Products> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <ccoh:ProductItem> <!--Optional:--> <ccoh:InventoryID>${ProductItem.InventoryID}</ccoh:InventoryID> <ccoh:Quantity>${ProductItem.Quantity}</ccoh:Quantity> <ccoh:UnitPrice>${ProductItem.UnitPrice}</ccoh:UnitPrice> <ccoh:ExtPrice>${ProductItem.ExtPrice}</ccoh:ExtPrice> <ccoh:Amount>${ProductItem.Amount}</ccoh:Amount> </ccoh:ProductItem> </ccoh:Products> </ccoh:opportunity> </ccoh:AddRenewalNoticeToOpportunity> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
